_header: Might is right for the land is lawless
Subjects: evils of the times; sermons, verse in
_description: Explanation for the Sentences of the Four Philosophers on the degeneracy of the times (3492) — three couplets and one triplet

BodLatTheD1.First Lines:
Miȝt is [ ] for þe land is lawlesliȝt is nyȝt [
                    ] for þe lord is redles…
BodLatTheD1.Last Lines:
…[ ] lord is wrongfull[ ] þis word is
                    songfull
BodLatTheD1.Note:
Designations as to speakers in right margin, ‘primus
                    dixit’, ‘secundus dixit’, etc.; outer half of page
                    badly damaged by damp; text mostly illegible.
